data.name: Garden of Seif: Curse of Gravehollow Peaks
data.detailed_description:
The Story
Garden of Seif: Curse of Gravehollow peak is a short fantasy/romance visual novel that features sprinkles of magic, mysterious beasts, and an enemies-to-lovers romance.

  • 3 different endings.
  • 10,000 words
  • Female protagonist
  • 1 dashing love interest
  • 1 mischievous but lovable fairy-godmother
  • SFX and cinematic cut scenes

Play through this adventure and help them get out of Gravehollow Peaks! The choice is entirely yours.

Garden of Seif: Curse of Gravehollow Peaks is an alternate side story based on the upcoming game Garden of Seif: Chronicles of an Assassin. https://store.steampowered.com/app/1926650/Garden_of_Seif_Chronicles_of_an_Assassin/

data.short_description: Lost in the cursed mountains of Gravehollow Peaks, two rival assassins must set their differences aside and find a way home... unless something finds them first. A story-rich fantasy with magic, romance, and choices that matter.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Mavericks 10.9.5
  • Processor: Radeon HD 5770
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Strong language, mild descriptions of violence, mild cartoon visuals of blood and violence, alcohol references, mentions of death, sexual references
